Question
========
  
Marleen wants to study whether students who go on holiday more often (measured by number of days on holiday in the past year) obtain higher grades (measured by the average exam grades in the past year). She suspects that the association becomes less strong when students are more intelligent (measured with an IQ-test). Which analysis technique should she use to test this hypothesis?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple linear regression without interaction.
* Multiple linear regression with interaction.
* Twoway ANOVA without interaction.
* Twoway ANOVA with interaction.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
